entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023
